pages.privacy-policy: CycleCraze - Best Bicycle Deals & Expert Advice Cycle Craze Home About Us Catalog +91 81 47257251 Home About Us Catalog Privacy Policy Last updated: July 3, 2024 Introduction Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is critically important to us. Information We Collect We collect information about you when you use our website. This information may include: Your name, email address, and contact details. Information automatically collected about your visit to our site, such as browsing history, pages viewed, and device information (IP address, browser type, etc.). How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in the following ways: To provide and maintain our website. To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested. To improve our website in order to better serve you. To administer a contest, promotion, survey, or other site feature. To send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our website and hold certain information. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. Your Rights You have the right to: Access and update your personal information. Request deletion of your personal information. Object to the processing of your personal information. Request restrictions on the processing of your personal information. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us cyclecraze@gmail.com This Privacy Policy was last updated on July 3, 2024. pages.about: CycleCraze - Top Bicycles & Accessories Online Cycle Craze Home About Us Catalog +91 81 47257251 Home About Us Catalog About CycleCraze Welcome to CycleCraze, your ultimate destination for all things cycling. Whether you are a seasoned cyclist or just starting out, we have something for everyone. Our goal is to provide top-quality bicycles, accessories, and gear to enhance your riding experience. WE COLLECTED FOR YOU THE BEST FROM THE CYCLING WORLD Cycle Craze specializes in the sale and service of bicycles, parts, accessories and equipment. We know the price of quality. Therefore, Cycle Craze only offers high-quality premium products at reasonable prices. And upon request, we will assemble a custom-made bicycle for you with a unique design and technical characteristics! Our Mission At CycleCraze, our mission is to inspire and support a cycling community that promotes a healthy lifestyle, environmental sustainability, and a sense of adventure. We believe in the power of cycling to transform lives and communities. We encourage everyone to embrace cycling as a means to improve physical health, mental well-being, and overall quality of life. Cycling is an accessible and enjoyable way to stay active and fit, and we are dedicated to providing the resources and support needed to help people get started and stay motivated. As a company, we are committed to promoting environmentally sustainable practices. We believe that cycling is a key component in reducing carbon footprints, decreasing traffic congestion, and creating cleaner, healthier communities. We strive to minimize our own environmental impact and encourage others to do the same. Still have questions? Call us at +91 81 47257251 We are at your service! And, of course, come to our store to see the products in person, personally evaluate the quality and make the right choice! CYCLE CRAZE - FIRST TEAM! All of our employees are former professional cyclists, champions and prize-winners of European competitions, members of the national team. Have no doubt, if anyone can provide you with truly professional advice, it is them. Cycle Craze consultants will help you in any matter: selecting a bike for your height, weight, riding style and purpose of buying a bike; assistance in choosing spare parts, accessories and equipment; consultations on any topic related to sports. Photo gallery ❮ ❯ Cycle Craze Home About Us Catalog Privacy Policy Terms and conditions +91 81 47257251 cyclecraze@gmail.com Unnamed Road, Khedi, Maharashtra 441203
